title: Hair On You Salon and Spa
creator: Sandy Clicks and Prints

extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Hair on You Salon and Spa. Hair on you Salon and Spa caters to everyone. We welcome all skin and hair types, men, women and children . We are like no other salon around from the dÃ©cor, individual personality, styles and family togetherness. Everyone would prefer our business because it is a clean, friendly, peaceful and organized environment. Clients should expect the best of the best. What makes Hair on You unique is that we care about the clientâs needs and we are consistent . All who work at Hair On You are blessed in the Christian faith. The stylist are very trendy and eccentric. Our business reflects our values and we want to be known as the best salon in the Maryland area. Each stylist is richly blessed with an overflowing income from working here and we love the level of diversity that we have. We are the premier beauty salon in the Odenton area.
